verses.text: Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Now, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, wilt thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, wilt thou \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*? yea, thou shalt \w shew|strong="H3045"\w* her all her \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.\f + \fr 22.2 \ft judge: or, plead for\f*\f + \fr 22.2 \ft bloody…: Heb. city of bloods?\f*\f + \fr 22.2 \ft shew her: Heb. make her know\f*

Then \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, The \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w sheddeth|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it, that her \w time|strong="H6256"\w* may \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* against herself to \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* herself.

Thou art become \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w* in thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* that thou hast \w shed|strong="H8210"\w*; and hast \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* thyself in thine \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* which thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w*; and thou hast caused thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* to draw \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, and art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add even\add* unto thy \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: therefore have I \w made|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* unto the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and a \w mocking|strong="H7048"\w* to all \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

\add Those that be\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, and \add those that be\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* from thee, shall \w mock|strong="H7046"\w* thee, \add which art\add* \w infamous|strong="H2931"\w* \add and\add* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w vexed|strong="H4103"\w*.\f + \fr 22.5 \ft infamous…: Heb. polluted of name, much in vexation\f*

Behold, the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* were in thee to their \w power|strong="H2220"\w* to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.\f + \fr 22.6 \ft power: Heb. arm\f*

In thee have they set \w light|strong="H7043"\w* by \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*: in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee have they \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* by \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* with the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*: in thee have they \w vexed|strong="H3238"\w* the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* and the \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.\f + \fr 22.7 \ft oppression: or, deceit\f*
Thou hast \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* mine holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, and hast \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*.

In thee are \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that carry \w tales|strong="H7400"\w* to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: and in thee they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee they \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w*.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft that…: Heb. of slanders\f*

In thee have they \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* their \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: in thee have they \w humbled|strong="H6031"\w* her that was set \w apart|strong="H5079"\w* for \w pollution|strong="H2931"\w*.

And \w one|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* with his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; and \w another|strong="H0376"\w* hath \w lewdly|strong="H2154"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* his daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*; and \w another|strong="H0376"\w* in thee hath \w humbled|strong="H6031"\w* his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft one: or, every one\f*\f + \fr 22.11 \ft another: or, every one\f*\f + \fr 22.11 \ft lewdly: or, by lewdness\f*

In thee have they \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w gifts|strong="H7810"\w* to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*; thou hast \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* and \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*, and thou hast greedily \w gained|strong="H1214"\w* of thy \w neighbours|strong="H7453"\w* by \w extortion|strong="H6233"\w*, and hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Behold, therefore I have \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* at thy dishonest \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* which thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and at thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* which hath been in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thee.

Can thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w endure|strong="H5975"\w*, or can thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w*, in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that I shall \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with thee? I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*, and will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

And I will \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* thee among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* thee in the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, and will \w consume|strong="H8552"\w* thy \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* out of thee.

And thou shalt take thine \w inheritance|strong="H2490"\w* in thyself in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 22.16 \ft shalt take…: or, shalt be profaned\f*
And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* is to me become \w dross|strong="H5509"\w*: all they \add are\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*, and \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*; they are \add even\add* the \w dross|strong="H5509"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 22.18 \ft dross of silver: Heb. drosses, etc\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because ye are all become \w dross|strong="H5509"\w*, behold, therefore I will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* you into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\add As\add* they \w gather|strong="H6910"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and \w lead|strong="H5777"\w*, and \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*, into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*, to \w blow|strong="H5301"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* upon it, to \w melt|strong="H5413"\w* \add it;\add* so will I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \add you\add* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, and I will \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* \add you there\add*, and \w melt|strong="H5413"\w* you.\f + \fr 22.20 \ft As…: Heb. According to the gathering\f*

Yea, I will \w gather|strong="H3664"\w* you, and \w blow|strong="H5301"\w* upon you in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of my \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*, and ye shall be \w melted|strong="H5413"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.

As \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* is \w melted|strong="H2046"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w furnace|strong="H3564"\w*, so shall ye be \w melted|strong="H5413"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon you.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Thou \add art\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that is not \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w*, nor \w rained|strong="H1656"\w* upon in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*.

\add There is\add* a \w conspiracy|strong="H7195"\w* of her \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof, like a \w roaring|strong="H7580"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w ravening|strong="H2963"\w* the \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*; they have \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*; they have \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w treasure|strong="H2633"\w* and precious \w things|strong="H3366"\w*; they have made her \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w widows|strong="H0490"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof.

Her \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* have \w violated|strong="H2554"\w* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and have \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* mine holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: they have put no \w difference|strong="H0914"\w* between the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* and \w profane|strong="H2455"\w*, neither have they \w shewed|strong="H3045"\w* \add difference\add* between the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*, and have \w hid|strong="H5956"\w* their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and I am \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.\f + \fr 22.26 \ft violated: Heb. offered violence to\f*

Her \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof \add are\add* like \w wolves|strong="H2061"\w* \w ravening|strong="H2963"\w* the \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \add and\add* to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w get|strong="H1214"\w* dishonest \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*.

And her \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* have \w daubed|strong="H2902"\w* them with \w untempered|strong="H8602"\w* \add morter\add*, \w seeing|strong="H2374"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, and \w divining|strong="H7080"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* unto them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*, when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* have used \w oppression|strong="H6231"\w*, and \w exercised|strong="H1497"\w* \w robbery|strong="H1498"\w*, and have \w vexed|strong="H3238"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*: yea, they have \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w wrongfully|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 22.29 \ft oppression: or, deceit\f*\f + \fr 22.29 \ft wrongfully: Heb. without right\f*

And I \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* for a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* among them, that should make \w up|strong="H1443"\w* the \w hedge|strong="H1447"\w*, and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w gap|strong="H6556"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that I should not \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* it: but I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* none.

Therefore have I poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* mine \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* upon them; I have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them with the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of my \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*: their own \w way|strong="H1870"\w* have I \w recompensed|strong="H5414"\w* upon their \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
